scripts.stree: bundle exec stree check Gemfile $(git ls-files '*.rb') $(git ls-files '*.rake') $(git ls-files '*.thor')
scripts.stree:fix: bundle exec stree write Gemfile $(git ls-files '*.rb') $(git ls-files '*.rake') $(git ls-files '*.thor')
scripts.autocheck: yarn rubocop && yarn stree && yarn lint && yarn pretty
scripts.autofix: yarn rubocop:fix && yarn stree:fix && yarn lint:fix && yarn pretty:fix
